reviewText:
If you liked Barbie Dreamhouse Party, than get it, this game is even better, it has black barbie as main character and a speaking frog, graphics are amazing, the 1024x max resolution is a nice touch and no controller support makes this game as hardcore as any Dark Souls games, so this game is also good choise for Souls fans, this is really a great game for anyone.

Not so next gen, but still better than AC:Unity 10/10.

reviewText: NOPE! The geometry is jacked and the games are the sad version of basic party multiplayer minigames...but I wish they were online multi so I could troll my friends. Can't even give me that TPatF? Nah...can't even...

reviewText: It's a beautiful game for kids, which really looks like the anime, and the music is good too. But the five chapters (about 25 mini-games) can be completed in 2 hours. And even if you can continue to play after the end to unlock all clothes, it's still short for the price. So get it in discount if you want to play it.

reviewText: no full hd resolution and you can't even stop the anoying sound before watching 4-5 min video for a game that costs 20€ i was expecting more
